languages.text: Если персонаж, получивший три и более ранений, своевременно не исцелит их с помощью {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплекта{/g}, то они станут травмами (число ранений, вызывающих травму, может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры). Травмы уменьшают {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} персонажа, а также дают дополнительный негативный эффект, который зависит от специфики конкретной травмы. Избавиться от травм и полностью исцелить их можно только в личных покоях Вольного Торговца на корабле.
languages.original_text: If a character who has received three or more {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} does not heal them in time with a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, the injuries will become traumas (the number of injuries that cause a trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Traumas reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and also inflict an additional negative effect, which depends on the specifics of a particular trauma. Traumas can only be removed and fully healed in the Rogue Trader's private quarters on the voidship.

traits.locale_text: Если персонаж, получивший три и более {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранений{/g}, своевременно не исцелит их с помощью {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплекта{/g}, то они станут травмами (число ранений, вызывающих травму, может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры). Травмы снижают показатели персонажа, а также дают дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}негативный эффект{/g}, который зависит от специфики конкретной травмы. Избавиться от травм и полностью исцелить их можно только в личных покоях Вольного Торговца на корабле.

Если персонаж, получивший три и более {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранений{/g}, своевременно не исцелит их с помощью {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплекта{/g}, то они станут травмами (число ранений, вызывающих травму, может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры). Травмы снижают показатели персонажа, а также дают дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}негативный эффект{/g}, который зависит от специфики конкретной травмы. Избавиться от травм и полностью исцелить их можно только в личных покоях Вольного Торговца на корабле.

languages.text: If a character who has received three or more {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} does not heal them in time with a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, the injuries will become traumas (the number of injuries that cause a trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Traumas reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and also inflict an additional negative effect, which depends on the specifics of a particular trauma. Traumas can only be removed and fully healed in the Rogue Trader's private quarters on the voidship.
languages.original_text: Если персонаж, получивший три и более ранений, своевременно не исцелит их с помощью {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплекта{/g}, то они станут травмами (число ранений, вызывающих травму, может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры). Травмы уменьшают {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} персонажа, а также дают дополнительный негативный эффект, который зависит от специфики конкретной травмы. Избавиться от травм и полностью исцелить их можно только в личных покоях Вольного Торговца на корабле.

traits.locale_text: If a character who has received three or more {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} does not heal them in time with a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, the injuries will become traumas (the number of injuries that cause a trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Traumas reduce character's stats and also grant an additional {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effect{/g}, which depends on the specifics of a particular trauma. Traumas can only be removed and fully healed in the Rogue Trader's private quarters on the voidship.

If a character who has received three or more {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} does not heal them in time with a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, the injuries will become traumas (the number of injuries that cause a trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Traumas reduce character's stats and also grant an additional {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effect{/g}, which depends on the specifics of a particular trauma. Traumas can only be removed and fully healed in the Rogue Trader's private quarters on the voidship.

If a character who has received three or more {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} does not heal them in time with a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, the injuries will become {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g} (the number of injuries that cause a trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Traumas reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and also inflict an additional {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}, which depends on the specifics of a particular trauma. Traumas can only be removed and fully healed in the Rogue Trader's private quarters on the voidship.

languages.text: Wenn ein Charakter, der drei oder mehr {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g} erlitten hat, diese nicht rechtzeitig mit einem {g|ib:Medikit}Medikit{/g} heilt, werden die Verletzungen zu Traumata (die Anzahl der Verletzungen, die zu einem Trauma führen, kann je nach gewähltem Schwierigkeitsgrad des Spiels variieren). Traumata vermindern die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} eines Charakters und fügen ihm außerdem einen zusätzlichen negativen Effekt zu, der von den Besonderheiten eines bestimmten Traumas abhängt. Traumata können nur in den Privatquartieren des Freihändlers auf dem Raumschiff entfernt und vollständig geheilt werden.
languages.original_text: If a character who has received three or more {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} does not heal them in time with a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, the injuries will become traumas (the number of injuries that cause a trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Traumas reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and also inflict an additional negative effect, which depends on the specifics of a particular trauma. Traumas can only be removed and fully healed in the Rogue Trader's private quarters on the voidship.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein Charakter, der drei oder mehr {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g} erlitten hat, diese nicht rechtzeitig mit einem {g|ib:Medikit}Medikit{/g} heilt, werden die Verletzungen zu {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g} (die Anzahl der Verletzungen, die zu einem Trauma führen, kann je nach gewähltem Schwierigkeitsgrad des Spiels variieren). Traumata vermindern die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} eines Charakters und fügen ihm außerdem einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negativen Effekt{/g} zu, der von den Besonderheiten eines bestimmten Traumas abhängt. Traumata können nur in den Privatquartieren des Freihändlers auf dem Raumschiff entfernt und vollständig geheilt werden.

languages.text: Si un personnage victime d'au moins trois {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions{/g} ne les soigne pas à temps à l'aide d'un {g|ib:Medikit}médikit{/g}, ces lésions se transforment en traumatismes (le nombre de lésions provoquant un traumatisme peut varier en fonction du niveau de difficulté choisi). Les traumatismes réduisent la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du personnage et lui infligent également un effet négatif supplémentaire, qui dépend de leurs spécificités. Les traumatismes ne peuvent disparaître et être complètement soignés que dans les quartiers privés du libre-marchand sur le vaisseau spatial.
languages.original_text: If a character who has received three or more {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} does not heal them in time with a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, the injuries will become traumas (the number of injuries that cause a trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Traumas reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and also inflict an additional negative effect, which depends on the specifics of a particular trauma. Traumas can only be removed and fully healed in the Rogue Trader's private quarters on the voidship.

traits.locale_text: Si un personnage victime de trois {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}blessures{/g} ou plus ne les soigne pas à temps à l'aide d'un {g|ib:Medikit}médikit{/g}, ces blessures se transforment en {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatismes{/g} (le nombre de blessures provoquant un traumatisme peut varier en fonction du niveau de difficulté que vous choisissez). Les traumatismes réduisent la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du personnage et lui infligent également un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effet négatif{/g} supplémentaire, qui dépend de leurs spécificités. Les traumatismes ne peuvent disparaître et être complètement soignés que dans les quartiers privés du Libre-Marchand sur le vaisseau spatial.

languages.text: 如果某个角色受到三处{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}，但却没有及时使用{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}进行治疗，那么这些伤势将会转化为创伤。触发创伤效果需要的伤势数量，可能会根据您的游戏难度不同而发生变化。创伤会降低角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，同时造成额外的负面效果，具体效果取决于创伤的具体情况。只有前往行商浪人的虚空舰进行休息，才能彻底治愈创伤。
languages.original_text: If a character who has received three or more {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} does not heal them in time with a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, the injuries will become traumas (the number of injuries that cause a trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Traumas reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and also inflict an additional negative effect, which depends on the specifics of a particular trauma. Traumas can only be removed and fully healed in the Rogue Trader's private quarters on the voidship.

traits.locale_text: 如果某个角色受到三处{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}，但却没有及时使用{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}进行治疗，那么这些伤势将会转化为{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}。触发创伤效果需要的伤势数量，可能会根据您的游戏难度不同而发生变化。创伤会降低角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，同时造成额外的{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}，具体效果取决于创伤的具体情况。只有前往行商浪人的虚空舰进行休息，才能彻底治愈创伤。

languages.original_text: If a character who has received three or more {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} does not heal them in time with a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, the injuries will become traumas (the number of injuries that cause a trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Traumas reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and also inflict an additional {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effect{/g}, which depends on the specifics of a particular trauma. Traumas can only be removed and fully healed in the Rogue Trader's private quarters on the voidship.

languages.text: Si un personaje que ha recibido tres o más {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g} no se cura a tiempo con un {g|ib:Medikit}botiquín{/g}, las lesiones se convierten en aflicciones (el número de lesiones necesario para sufrir aflicciones depende de la dificultad del juego). Las aflicciones reducen la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del personaje e infligen un efecto negativo adicional que depende del tipo concreto de aflicción que sufra. Las aflicciones solo se pueden eliminar y curar por completo en los aposentos personales de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de la nave del vacío.
languages.original_text: If a character who has received three or more {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} does not heal them in time with a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, the injuries will become traumas (the number of injuries that cause a trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Traumas reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and also inflict an additional negative effect, which depends on the specifics of a particular trauma. Traumas can only be removed and fully healed in the Rogue Trader's private quarters on the voidship.

traits.locale_text: Si un personaje que ha recibido tres o más {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g} no se cura a tiempo con un {g|ib:Medikit}botiquín{/g}, las lesiones se convierten en {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicciones{/g} (el número de lesiones necesario para sufrir aflicciones depende de la dificultad del juego). Las aflicciones reducen la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del personaje e infligen un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efecto negativo{/g} adicional que depende del tipo concreto de aflicción que sufra. Las aflicciones solo se pueden eliminar y curar por completo en los aposentos personales de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de la nave del vacío.

languages.text: キャラクターが3以上の{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}を負い、{g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}での回復が間に合わない場合、受けた負傷は外傷となる（外傷となる負傷の数はプレイヤーが選択した難易度により異なる）。外傷はキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}を低下させ、さらにマイナス効果を与えるが、これは特定の外傷の仕様により異なる。外傷はローグトレーダーのヴォイドシップの中にある私室でのみ除去、完全治癒が可能である。
languages.original_text: If a character who has received three or more {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} does not heal them in time with a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, the injuries will become traumas (the number of injuries that cause a trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Traumas reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and also inflict an additional negative effect, which depends on the specifics of a particular trauma. Traumas can only be removed and fully healed in the Rogue Trader's private quarters on the voidship.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターが3以上の{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}を負い、{g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}での回復が間に合わない場合、受けた負傷は{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}トラウマ{/g}となる（トラウマとなる負傷の数はプレイヤーが選択した難易度により異なる）。トラウマはキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}を低下させ、さらに{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}マイナス効果{/g}を与えるが、これは特定のトラウマの仕様により異なる。トラウマはローグトレーダーのヴォイドシップの中にある私室でのみ除去、完全治癒が可能である。

languages.text: Üç veya daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlığa{/g} maruz kalmış bir karakter, {g|ib:Medikit}sıhhiye çantası{/g} kullanılarak zamanında iyileştirilmezse bu sakatlıklar travmaya dönüşürler (travmaya sebep olan sakatlıkların sayısı, seçilen oyun zorluğuna bağlı olarak değişebilir). Travma, karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değerini azaltır ve ayrıca travmanın özelliğine bağlı olarak ilave bir olumsuz etki yaratır. Travmalar yalnızca Hür Tacir'in uçsuz gemisindeki şahsi odasında giderilip tamamen iyileştirilebilir.
languages.original_text: If a character who has received three or more {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} does not heal them in time with a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, the injuries will become traumas (the number of injuries that cause a trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Traumas reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and also inflict an additional negative effect, which depends on the specifics of a particular trauma. Traumas can only be removed and fully healed in the Rogue Trader's private quarters on the voidship.
